item.description: The Maine Buddhist Gathering's Spring Community Potluck and Sitting Meditation Evening is scheduled for Sunday, May 5th at 5pm at the Allen Avenue Unitarian Church in Portland. May marks a point of transition as we move out of our winter cocoons into the bright light of summer.  May is also the time of year when people around the world hold festivals for Buddha's birthday. What an ideal time to celebrate the power of community. The Community Potluck is an opportunity for us, sanghas and individual practitioners, to experience a larger sense of community by sitting and eating together.  All are welcome.
item.how_to_find_us: Potluck will be in the sanctuary
item.name: Maine Buddhist Gathering Potluck
